summary: This code imports a function from adtools to test making connections between cats and dogs. It defines three test functions: "test_main", "test_delete", and "test_query". The "test_query" function retrieves cat and dog ads. The main code block runs the "test_query" function if this script is run directly.

details.comment: This code imports a function from adtools to test making connections between cats and dogs. It defines three test functions: "test_main", "test_delete", and "test_query". The "test_query" function retrieves cat and dog ads. The main code block runs the "test_query" function if this script is run directly.
